name: Losing Power
description:
Losing Power was a Ludum Dare 39 Compo Entry. The theme for Ludum Dare 39 was Running Out of Power.

Gameplay Overview:

This game is a platformer game. In this game, the player can move on platforms and jump. The goal for each level is to move and jump to reach a door that gives the player power. However, if the player runs out of power before reaching the door, the player will have to restart the level once again. The game is level based and dying in a level causes the player to restart the level once again.

Story:
You are a machine that is losing power. Complete each level to gain power but you must hurry, otherwise you will lose power. Good luck, you will need it!

Control Overview:
Up arrow key or W=Jump
Left arrow key or A=Move left
Right arrow key or D=Move Right

In the original Ludum Dare 39 Compo version, press the Escape key to return back to the Main Menu.

In the remake of the original Ludum Dare 39 Compo version, press the Escape key to return back to level select.

Credits:
